attractions.name: St. Joseph Parish Church (Bamboo Organ)
attractions.description: Home to the world-famous Bamboo Organ, a 19th-century church organ with unique bamboo pipes. A National Cultural Treasure.

attractions.name: Heritage Church
attractions.description: A centuries-old Spanish colonial church featuring beautiful baroque architecture and religious artifacts.

attractions.name: Mountain Trail
attractions.description: A scenic hiking trail offering panoramic views of the surrounding countryside. Suitable for beginners and experienced hikers.

attractions.name: Public Market
attractions.description: Experience local flavors at the public market. Fresh produce, local delicacies, and authentic Filipino street food.

events.name: Town Fiesta
events.description: Annual celebration featuring parades, cultural shows, food festivals, and community activities honoring the patron saint.

events.name: Harvest Festival
events.description: A thanksgiving celebration for bountiful harvest with agricultural exhibits, contests, and traditional games.

events.name: Founding Anniversary
events.description: Commemorating the establishment of the city with civic activities, sports events, and cultural presentations.

travelInfo.howToGetThere: From Manila, take a bus heading to the province. Travel time is approximately 4-6 hours depending on traffic. Jeepneys and tricycles are available for local transportation.
travelInfo.bestTimeToVisit: October to May (dry season). The cooler months of December to February are ideal for outdoor activities.
tips: Carry cash as ATMs may be limited
